description:
Voltages, temperatures and fans speed monitoring

HWMonitor for Windows速 x86/x64 is a hardware monitoring program that reads PC systems main health sensors : voltages, temperatures, powers, currents, fans speed, utilizations, clock speeds ...

The program handles :
- CPU and GPU-level hardware monitoring
- LPCIO chips with monitoring features (ITE速 IT87 series, Winbond速 and Nuvoton速 ICs)
- memory modules with thermal sensors
- SSD / hard disks via S.M.A.R.T.
- batteries
- and more ...
- AMD Ryzen Z2 and Z2 Extreme (Strix Point).
- AMD Ryzen Threadripper 9000 (Shimada Peak).
- NVIDIA RTX 5060 Ti (GB206), RTX 5050 (GB207).
